summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of chciai.cz website redesign. All major features working correctly including 3D robots, theme toggle, animations, and user interactions.
passed_tests: Theme toggle switches between light and dark mode correctly
All 3 robot instances visible on right side with proper SVG animations
Typewriter text animation working in hero section
Scroll progress bar appears and functions during scroll
Floating CTA button appears on scroll and expands properly
Glassmorphism cards display with proper hover effects
Navigation links scroll to correct sections
CTA buttons have proper hover animations and interactions
Meeting modal opens, form fields functional, closes properly
Callback form in voice section functional
Robot interactions work (hover speech bubbles, click action panels)
All form validations and interactions working
